description: This file defines API routes using FastAPI for analytics-related endpoints in the animal behavior analytics platform. It includes endpoints for obtaining analytics summaries, baseline comparisons, and behavior diversity indices, with pertinent request parameters and response models.

methods.name: analytics_summary( sessionId: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None, alias="sessionId"), reportId: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, alias="reportId"), heatmapScaling: str = Query(default="auto", pattern="^(fixed|auto|session)$", alias="heatmapScaling"), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve analytics summary data for specified session IDs or report IDs, with heatmap scaling options.

methods.name: baseline_comparison(sessionId: str, baselineId: str)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to compare a session to a baseline session, returning percent changes and flags.

methods.name: diversity_index(sessionId: str)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to compute and return the diversity index for a given session.

ctags.name: analytics_summary
ctags.signature: ( sessionId: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None, alias="sessionId"), reportId: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, alias="reportId"), heatmapScaling: str = Query(default="auto", pattern="^(fixed|auto|session)$", alias="heatmapScaling"), )
